title: LoL Client RP Purchase Bug
body: Whenever i attempt to purchase RP for the last 4 days it has said "You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time..." The first time i got it it was probably true because i did in fact write my information wrong, but i waited a day and tried again. Same result. So i then waited another 24 hours to try again and the same result occurred. Tried it twice more and it still comes up with the same result.
